means: 使（某人）熟悉，使通晓( familiarize的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I spent the first few weeks familiarizing myself with the new job.
sentence.Network_cn: 我用头几个星期的时间让自己熟悉了新工作.

sentence.Network_en: Above 2 years experience with cable and cable harness, Familiarizing production technique for cable harness.
sentence.Network_cn: 2年以上线缆或线束生产系统工作经历,熟悉线缆或线束产品的生产工艺.

sentence.Network_en: We recommend familiarizing yourself with the tools to keep annoying or disruptive voice chatters at bay.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们建议分自己熟悉频道的操作,用来将那些恼人的或是来乱的玩家区隔开来.

list.abs: spirit 有哪些中文翻译？？_百度知道 ... wood spirit 木精，甲醇 familiar spirit 妖精 spirit gum n. （演员粘假发用的）快干胶水.
有没有有趣点的英语单词和中文词语？_百度知道 ... eleventh hour: 最后时刻 familiar talk: 庸俗的交谈 family tree: 家族系谱.
出版专业英语词汇 - 清扬古风的日志 - 网易博客 ... fairy tales 神话，童话 familiar essay 小品文，随笔 family history 家史.
fall to the ground (计划.希望等)失败,落空familiar with 熟悉,了解far from 非但不…(而且)

entry.def: If you familiarize yourself with something, or if someone familiarizes you with it, you learn about it and start to understand it.

example.ex: I was expected to familiarise myself with the keyboard...
example.tran: 对我的要求是熟悉键盘。

example.ex: The goal of the experiment was to familiarize the people with the new laws.
example.tran: 试行的目的就是要让人们熟悉新法规。
